mapper.select: SELECT hr.id,hr.lastname,hr.sex,hr.mobile,hr.email,hr.departmentid,hd.departmentname,hr.status,hr.SubAccountName,hl.locationname,c.name FROM HrmResource hr LEFT JOIN HrmDepartment hd ON hr.departmentid = hd.id LEFT JOIN HrmLocations hl ON hr.locationid = hl.id LEFT JOIN FnaCostCenterDtl cd ON hr.departmentid =cd.objId AND cd.type=2 LEFT JOIN FnaCostCenter c ON c.id =cd.fccId -- WHERE hr.id=1154
mapper.update:
UPDATE HrmResource SET updateflag = 0 WHERE
id=#{item}
